Currently available GeneNMF vignettes:

1. A demo of the **basic functionalities** of GeneNMF on PBMC scRNA-seq data - [GeneNMF basics](https://carmonalab.github.io/GeneNMF.demo/NMF_demo_PBMC.html)

2. GeneNMF on cancer cells to characterize **intratumor heterogeneity** - [Cancer metaprograms](https://carmonalab.github.io/GeneNMF.demo/NMF_demo_cancercells.html)

More information available at the [GeneNMF repository](https://github.com/carmonalab/GeneNMF) and [GeneNMF demo repository](https://github.com/carmonalab/GeneNMF.demo).
